name: VidaGenio

”Alexa, dim lights to 50%”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Vida Genio is the smart home skill from Fermax that gives you the ability to control smart devices and appliances connected to Vida Genio smart hub through your voice.

 

Here is what you need to do:

1. Set up Vida Genio hub and connects your smart devices and appliances to the hub.

2. Open Amazon Alexa app and enable “Vida Genio” skill.

3 Sign in with Vida Genio account.

4. When Alexa and Vida Genio are successfully linked, press “Discoer Devices” button to discover all devices.
